Package com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model.Transaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
HashHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoinbaseTransaction
public class Transaction extends Object implements HashHelper
The Transaction class represents a GB Coin transaction A transaction features a list of Inputs, Outputs, and its own hash

    • addSignature

      public void addSignature(byte[] signature, int index)
      add a signature to the input
      Parameters:
      signature - a valid signature that is not null
      index - the index of the input

    • addInput

      public void addInput(byte[] prevTxHash, int outputIndex)
      Parameters:
      prevTxHash - the hash of the previous transaction
      outputIndex - the output index from which we derive our amount from

    • addOutput

      public void addOutput(double value, PublicKey address)
      Method to add a new output to our list of outputs
      Parameters:
      value - the value of the GBcoin transaction
      address - the address of whom it should go to

    • toByteArray

      public byte[] toByteArray()
      Override the HashHelper's toByteArray method because we do not want to create a byte representation of this entire object as it includes a private key, which is a big no-no
      Specified by:
      toByteArray in interface HashHelper
      Returns:
      a byte representation of this entire object, minus the private key
